name: Affe's Death Counter
description:
Affe's Death Counter mod for tModLoader: Displays the total number of deaths with customizable options for a personalized gaming experience. Keep track of your deaths with additional settings and detailed statistics.

The "affe's Death Counter" modification is designed for the game Terraria using the tModLoader platform. This mod allows players to track their total number of deaths in the game, offering customizable settings to create a unique gaming experience.

The main functions:
Death counter display: Users can see their death counter under the map/health interface or as a pop-up text.
Text settings: The ability to adjust the text size, its position on the screen, and also lock the display position.
Toggle the visibility of the death counter: The death count can be displayed as part of the UI or as text bubbles. This function can be switched.
Easy to add and remove: The mod can be added or removed at any time without interrupting the gameplay.
Cause of Death Tracking: Viewing detailed information about the causes of deaths in the game is available via a hotkey, providing more detailed information about your deaths.

Additional features:
Displaying the death counter with information accessories: Option to display death counter with accessories like Tally Counter or better (including REK 3000, PDA, Cell Phone, Shellphone), which can be toggled in settings.

name: Angler Shops Alternative
description:
"Angler Shops Alternative" is a unique modification for tModLoader that expands the capabilities of the NPC Angler in Terraria by adding two new shops with a variety of items.

“Angler Shops Alternative” is a modification based on the original “Angler Shop” mod. It offers players more flexibility and options by adding two new shops for the NPC Angler. These shops include many items that were previously only available through completing quests, such as the Fishing Bobbler, Bottomless Bucket of Honey, Honey Absorbing Sponge, and other quest rewards.

Features:
Two shops for NPC Angler: This allows you to add missing items including the Fishing Bobbler, Bottomless Honey Bucket, Honey Absorbing Sponge, and other quest rewards.
Blocking some items behind bosses: The mod adds the option to block some items behind bosses in the Mod configuration.
Dialogue Panel Rework Mod Compatibility: Fully compatible with the Dialogue Panel Rework mod.
Setting up a custom currency: When enabled in the mod configuration, a custom currency (Angler coins) will be enabled for two Angler stores.

name: Microdungeons And More — A Worldgen
description:
“Microdungeons And More - A Worldgen Mod” is a modification for tModLoader that enriches the world of Terraria with new structures and world generation elements, making each playthrough unique.

“Microdungeons And More - A Worldgen Mod” is a JustImpaxim creation for tModLoader that brings new elements and structures to Terraria, making each game more exciting.

Current content:
Plains/Canyons: Deep chasms that cut through the surface and extend deep into the earth.
Ice Fortresses: Micro-dungeons full of treasures and traps hidden in icy biomes.
Abandoned Hellevators: Vertical structures found underground.
Underground Lakes: Vast bodies of water that can be found underground.
Golden Lake: An underground lake filled with honey and gold.
Punished Church: A micro-dungeon generated in Hell.

name: Fast Fall
description:
"Transform your Terraria experience with the Fast Fall Mod! Add the ability to quickly fall down by pressing the DOWN button, like in many other 2D platformers. Highly customizable and easy to use."

Fast Fall is a simple but effective modification for Terraria that adds the ability to quickly fall down, like many other 2D platformers. This feature makes movement through the world more fluid and dynamic, allowing players to quickly move between levels and overcome obstacles without unnecessary effort.

Features:
Fast fall: Simply press the DOWN button to instantly speed up your descent, allowing you to quickly progress through the world of Terraria.
Highly customizable: The modification offers a wide range of settings, allowing players to adjust the speed and other parameters of the fast fall to suit their individual preferences.

name: InfraSonic (tVoice)
description:
"InfraSonic" is an innovative modification for Terraria that offers a unique opportunity to communicate directly in the game without the need to use third-party programs. With InfraSonic, you can interact harmoniously with your friends, share strategies and coordinate actions without being distracted from the gameplay.

Features:
Basic voice chat: Similar to the features available in CSGO, InfraSonic provides an easy and reliable way to communicate within the game.
Positional effect: Player voices will be spatially positioned, adding realism and depth to your interactions in the world of Terraria.

Benefits of use:
Automatically lower the background music volume: Background Music Ducking automatically reduces the volume of background music during calls, ensuring clear and understandable conversations.
Dynamic sound attenuation: Players' voices will be adjusted based on the distance between them, creating a surprisingly realistic gaming atmosphere.

name: Custom Zone Titles
description:
Extend the functionality of Biome Titles with the "Custom Zone Titles" modification for tModLoader, allowing you to assign unique titles to zones of your choice. Create your own titles and personalize your Terraria world!

Custom Zone Titles are an integral addition to Biome Titles, allowing you to create unique, custom-titled zones in your Terraria world.

Features:
Assigning titles to zones: Now you can easily create and name zones in your world. Highlight important places or buildings by giving them unique titles.
Intuitive interface: Creating and editing zones is carried out using a convenient interface that does not require much effort. Just drag, click and enjoy your personalized zones.
Resourceless creation: You don't need any additional resources to create zones. Just use the workbench and your ideas!

name: JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation
description:
JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation (Generation from JereTheJuggler) is a mod for tModLoader, which enriches the world generation process in Terraria.

Unique structures: The mod adds a variety of structures, ranging from small cosmetic changes to full-fledged new objects that will help you progress through the game.
Diversity: You'll find everything here - from underground traps to huge bones and abandoned mines.
Integration with vanilla blocks: The mod uses only vanilla blocks and items, which allows you to preserve the atmosphere of Terraria.
Setting: You can turn each feature on and off through the in-game settings menu.

Here are some of the implemented features:
Hanging Spiked Traps: New traps hidden in dungeons.
Towers in snow biomes: Small towers protecting snow biomes.
Giant worm teeth: Teeth protruding from walls in the Blackness.
Giant Bones: Shattered bones in the Red biome.
Additional Gems: Risky opportunities to get extra jewelry.
Abandoned mines: Huge mines in the depths of the cave layer.
piers: Piers for fishing on the ocean.
Flower biome: Flower fertilizer has brought results.
Custom rails for minecarts: Are you ready for an adrenaline rush?
Hell's houses: Because hell hasn't been evil enough yet.
JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation - a great way to make the world of Terraria more unique and interesting!

name: Thorium + Calamity Convergence REDUX
description:
Thorium + Calamity Convergence Mod REDUX is a mod for tModLoader, which combines two popular mods: Thorium + Calamity.

Improved Progression: The mod reduces the redundancy that occurs when both mods do essentially the same thing. There are now new recipe trees, sometimes even completely new recipes for items. And finally there are no identical recipes for vertebrae and skin!
Combination of Classes: Class progression has been revised. For example, Angel Threads are now available after Plantera, and Terrarium Particle Sprinters и Seraph Tracers enter into the normal progression.
Authors: Original author of the mod - kittenchilly, and it is supported zriverazrty. The mod has also been fixed by the team LuiAFK Reborn.
Recommendations: Since this may contradict much of what is written in both wikis, it is recommended to use Management for new recipes or Recipe Browserif you prefer it.
Thorium + Calamity Convergence Mod REDUX is a great way to improve your gaming experience if you want to play with both mods at the same time!

name: Automation & Defense
description:
Welcome to the world of incredible automation and defense with the Automation & Defense mod for Terraria. This technology mod is designed to satisfy the passion for automation and is inspired by the Create Mod in Minecraft. Let's plunge into the world of innovation!

Transport System:
	Item Transporter:
		Moves objects by emulating a pipeline system. Easily connects to Funnel for extract/insert as well as Splitter/Merger.
	Item Funnel:
		Acts as an extractor and inserter, depending on the direction of the connected Transporter. Interactive only with chests.
		Ability to set a filter for extraction mode.
	Splitter & Merger:
		Two functions in one. Splitter and combiner in one bottle.
		When exiting in a certain direction:
		If you have a filter installed, the item will preferentially be directed in the appropriate direction, otherwise they will be evenly distributed in all directions.
Automation System:
	Stone Generator:
		Continuously generates stone blocks, directing them to the chest nearby.
	Ore Extractor:
		Extracts ores (...by magic) from stone blocks.
		Required: Pickaxe (power determines which ores can be extracted), input chest with stone blocks, output chest to store ores.
		Possibility of installing a filter so that only specific ore is extracted. Otherwise, all ores are extracted randomly (1% chance per stone block).
Automatic Crafter:
	Periodically creates items.
	Required: Recipe item, associated crafting stations, input chest with ingredients, output chest to store crafted items.
	Items with proximity conditions to water/honey/lava can be crafted for free. Items that require Demon Altar are not supported (unless you have another mod that adds an item to place altars, but I haven't tested).
Wood Cleaner:
	Retrieves wood and sends it to the Wood Harvester Base below. Can be placed on top of each other to create a long line.
Wood Cleaner Base:
	Stores wood from cleaners above it. Sends the wood to the chest next to her.
Item Vacuum:
	Collects items around him and places them in chests on both sides.
	The radius can be increased/decreased.

Defense System:
Magic Tower:
	Automatically picks up bullets from chests near her to shoot nearby enemies. Average speed and low damage.
	Added a new recipe for Musket Ball (requires any iron ingots) so that most bullets in the game can be automated using the Auto Crafter.

name: Nitrate (Performance Optimizer)
description:
Nitrate (Performance Optimizer) is a mod for Terraria created to significantly improve the game's performance by introducing extensive optimizations to various functions. The mod takes advantage of parallelism, SIMD instructions, GPU rendering and other modern technical solutions designed to increase the speed and stability of the gameplay.

Please note:
Nitrate is in early development; Some features may not be compatible with other mods.
Balance between performance and accuracy: We strive to find the perfect balance between game speed and visual fidelity.
Save Security: Your saves should be safe, but visual distortions and glitches may occur.

Main characteristics of the mod:
	Dust particle processing: Rewritten and optimized for GPU, which significantly increases performance (requires testing with modified particles).
	Parallelization of particle update: Increases game speed by simultaneous processing.
	Rain visualization on GPU: optimized so that most of the processing occurs on the video card (may not work correctly with mods that change the textures or color of rain).
	Parallelization of rain update: Increase productivity through more efficient processing.
	Replacing FNA types with SIMD: Important parts of the code now use JIT internal SIMD types to optimize execution.
	Tiled rendering and lighting: rewritten to be chunk-based and partially processed on the GPU (the current version may have bugs, for example, when using spelunker potions).

name: Better Autosave
description:
“Best AutoSave” is a modification for the famous platformer Terraria, created to work with tModLoader. It is an advanced autosave tool that allows players to customize autosave intervals in both single player and multiplayer.

Mod features:
Independent installation on servers and clients.
Single and Multiplayer Configuration:
	In a single player game and on servers, you can set the frequency of autosaving of the world and character (by default, every 10 minutes).
	In multiplayer, the frequency of saving the client character is adjusted (by default, every 5 minutes).
Ability to specify the autosave interval for the world on the server (regardless of the game, where autosave occurs once per game day).
Additional notes:
Single player mode requires the Autosave setting to be enabled in the game settings.
Automatic saving of the world on servers occurs once per game day, despite the mod settings.
The minimum possible autosave interval is 10 seconds, which is due to game stability reasons.

name: Better Treasure Bag Loot
description:
Better Treasure Bag Loot is a mod for tModLoader that optimizes the item drop rates of vanilla Treasure Bags and Master items (pets and mounts) so that you don't have to kill the boss over and over again to get a single reward.

Boss Pets and Mounts:
Drop rate set to 100%
All treasure bags:
Includes the corresponding boss trophy
King Slime Treasure Bag:
Slimy Saddle drop rate set to 100%
The Ninja set will drop entirely
Eye of Cthulhu Treasure Bag:
Most crimtane/demonite ores will drop (87 pieces)
Dirklops Treasure Bag:
The Eye Bone, Eye Umbrella and Radio Item will all drop out entirely.
The above items will be randomly attached to the additional item (for compatibility with other mods)
Wall of Flesh Treasure Bag:
All four emblems will drop in one piece
Emblems will be randomly attached to an additional item (especially for Calamity)
Queen Slime Treasure Bag:
Gelatinous Pillion drop rate set to 100%
Hook of Dissonance drop rate set to 100%
Crystal Assassin Set will drop entirely
Mechanical Boss Treasure Bags:
Most of the hallowed ingots will drop (35 pieces)
Most souls will drop (40 for everyone)
Plantera Treasure Bag:
Thorn Hook drop rate set to 100%
Golem Treasure Bag:
Picksaw drop rate set to 100%
Most beetle shells will drop (23 pieces)
Duke Fishron's Treasure Bag:
Fishron Wings drop rate set to 100%
Empress of Light Treasure Bag:
Empress Wings drop rate set to 100%
Betsy's Treasure Bag:
Betsy's Wings drop rate set to 100%
Most Defender Medals will drop (49 pieces)

name: Fargo's Banner Boost
description:
Fargo's Banner Boost is a unique mod for tModLoader that adds RPG elements that strengthen you against enemies as you defeat them.

Main functions of the mod:
Upon reaching every 50th kill (by default), you gain damage reduction and increased damage against enemies.
At the maximum level of 20, you are completely immune to damage and always kill enemies in one hit.

name: Fargo's Fallen Stars
description:
Fargo's Fallen Stars is a mod for tModLoader that allows you to control how often fallen stars appear.

Main features of the mod:
Setting the spawn frequency: Fargo's Fallen Stars mod allows you to adjust how often fallen stars appear. By default it is set to 2 times faster, but you can set the value from 1 to 500 to achieve the desired result.
Frequency setting name changed: In the new update, the name of the fallen star spawn rate setting has been changed to more accurately describe its function. You can now enter any value (from 1 to 500) without using the slider.
Description updated: The description of the mod has been updated to better reflect its capabilities and features.
Updated workshop image: The mod's image in the Steam Workshop has also been updated to more accurately represent its functionality.

name: In-game Translate
description:
In-game Translate is a mod for tModLoader that provides fast machine translation of text within the game, supporting text added by other mods.

Main functions of the mod:
Quick translation of item hint: The In-game Translate modification allows you to quickly translate item prompts. Now you can easily understand the meaning of objects and their features in your native language.
Automatic translation of chat messages: The mod automatically translates chat messages from other players. Now you can communicate with players in different languages ​​without language barriers.
Several translation services available: The In-game Translate mod provides several APIs for text translation. You can choose the translation service that is most convenient for you.
A free API is available without the need for a key.
Opening the translator via hotkeys: You can open the translator website using hotkeys. The mod suggests using the built-in Steam browser for quick and easy access to the translator.
Automatic detection and translation of selected text: The modification automatically detects and translates text that the mouse is hovering over. Now you can easily understand the meaning of unclear phrases or words.
Translated text cache: The mod stores a cache of translated text, so after restarting the game there is no need to translate the text again.

name: Infernum Master and Legendary Modes Patch
description:
Infernum Master and Legendary Modes Patch is a mod for tModLoader that removes the Calamity Infernum Mode restrictions that prevent you from playing Master Mode and using the For the Worthy or Zenith secret seeds (getfixedboi).

Removing restrictions: The Infernum Master and Legendary Modes Patch allows you to enjoy Infernum Mode along with Master Mode and use secret seeds For the Worthy or Zenith (getfixedboi). Now you can experience all the challenge and excitement of Infernum Mode combined with the game's other challenges and features.
Thanks to the developers of Infernum Mode: The author of the mod expresses gratitude to the developers of Infernum Mode for making the creation of this patch much easier and not hindering it. This allowed the mod developer to focus on improving and expanding the game's features.

If you want to enjoy the full potential of Infernum Mode combined with Master Mode and the For the Worthy or Zenith secret seeds (getfixedboi), then the Infernum Master and Legendary Modes Patch is the perfect addition for you. Immerse yourself in an exciting game world with increased challenge and rewards!

name: WADTU (What Ammo Does This Use)
description:
Ever wondered what ammo your weapons use in Terraria? Our mod “WADTU (What Ammunition?)” gives you the perfect solution! With this mod you will have additional information right in the weapon tooltips, making the selection of ammunition fast and convenient!

Advanced Tips:
	Each ammo-enabled weapon now displays the ammo type used in its tooltip.
	Accurate information about the type of ammunition the weapon is compatible with.
Customizability:
	Added a configuration setting to change the message in the ammunition line.
	Option to disable the display of specific ammunition in the tooltip.
Updates and Support:
	Updated icons to improve visual presentation.
	Added a Discord link in the description for community communication and support.
	Home page with a link to Discord for easy access to the community.
Client Optimization:
	The mod works on the client side, without requiring server installation.
	Easy to use and will not affect the operation of the server.

name: Bank Buttons
description:
The “Bank Buttons” mod is a convenient tool for all lovers of order and quick access to resources in the game Terraria. This mod adds special buttons to the interface that allow you to instantly open your vaults, be it chests, alchemy tables or any other banking items, making it easier to manage your inventory and saving you valuable time.

Instant Access:
Quick buttons for opening various bank cells.
Terms of Use:
To access the contents of the vault, you must have the corresponding banking item in your inventory, in the "empty bag" or be near the placed vault.
Control:
Shift-click on the button to quickly transfer items to the appropriate storage (option enabled/disabled).
Assignable keys for each storage according to the user's wishes.
Interface Customization:
Move buttons anywhere on the screen.
Ability to drag buttons using the middle mouse button (enabled in settings).
Flexibility Settings:
Disable the requirement to have a bank item to access the vault.Unique Appearance and Settings:

User interface:
You decide where to place your storage control buttons.
Personal Convenience:
Drag buttons across the screen to create the perfect user interface.

name: Lures Display Bait
description:
The Lures Display Bait mod makes life easier for every fisherman in Terraria by adding an unobtrusive but extremely useful indicator to your fishing lures. Now, without any extra effort, you will always see exactly what type of bait is hanging on the end of your hook - this will make the fishing process more intuitive and comfortable.

Basic Functionality:
A visualization of the bait being used hangs directly on the hook of your bait.
Options Settings:
It is recommended to use the mod's configuration settings for maximum comfort and functionality.
Compatibility:
The mod is designed to work harmoniously with various textures and additions to Terraria.
Compatibility Notes:

Internal Name:
"LureBaitDisplay" for easy integration with other mods.
Recommendations for Use:
When calling the mod functionality in your code, be sure to add a link to the minimum required version, or better yet, the latest release.
Use Mod.Call("HideBaitType", int itemType) in function PostSetupContent() your mod to hide certain types of bait on the hook.
Use Mod.Call("IgnoreLureType", int projectileType) in function PostSetupContent() of your mod to ignore rendering of specific types of lures (all mod functionality will be disabled for these types, including hiding lures).

name: Foldering — A Terraria Sorting
description:
Discover a new dimension of order and style in your Terraria world with the Foldering - A Terraria Sorting Mod. This is not just a modification - it is the pinnacle of organization and visual artistry that will elevate your gaming experience.

Systematic Organization:
Create folders to organize your worlds and characters with perfect precision.
Each folder contains a rich palette of colors that brings your game interface to life.
Unrivaled Convenience:
Easier access and management of your worlds and characters.
Put an end to the chaos of unorganized lists and endless searching.
Intuitive Categorization:
Assign unique color codes to folders to quickly find what you need.
Visually differentiate worlds and characters with color cues as if created by a digital artist.
Goodbye Infinite Scrolling:
Navigating the worlds of Terraria will now be done with grace and ease.
All your worlds and characters are now clearly organized into separate folders.
Design Aesthetics:
Turn organization into art with color and structure.
Unleash your creativity by customizing your gaming interface with your own style.

Your Journey to Order Begins:

Prepare to journey through the sophisticated and sophisticated world of organization in Terraria.
Take your gaming experience to new heights: where every element is organized and colors are the brush of your creativity.
Enter a world where precision and beauty come together to transform your adventure into an unforgettable work of gaming art.
Increase the convenience and beauty of the interface in Terraria with the Folders - Sorting Mod for Terraria and make managing your digital universe a work of art.

name: High FPS Support
description:
The mod allows you to play Terraria at frame rates above 60FPS without changing the game speed. It offers client optimization, game speed settings and high FPS optimizations. Problems may arise when used in conjunction with other mods and monitor requirements. Recommended use with caution.

High FPS support:
Allows Terraria to render over 60 frames per second without changing the speed of the world simulation.
Client optimization:
The mod is completely client-side and does not affect server mechanics when playing in multiplayer mode.
Game speed settings:
In a single-player game, configuration settings are available that allow you to speed up or slow down the game for fun.
Optimizations for high FPS:
Includes several optimizations designed to help achieve high frame rates. These optimizations are disabled by default and can be enabled through the mod's config file.
Potential problems:

Monitor requirements:
For the mod to work correctly, you must disable the frame skip function in the game settings (“Frame Skip” must be set to “Off”), and also use a monitor with a refresh rate higher than 60 Hz.
Visual glitches:
Occasional minor visual inconsistencies or artifacts may occur.
Compatibility with other mods:
Compatibility with other mods is not guaranteed. Significant visual glitches may occur if other mods render objects in an incompatible manner. Solving these problems is only possible if the authors of other mods add support for this mod.

name: Reduced Mining
description:
Reduced Mining is a simple mod for tModLoader that allows you to significantly reduce the time spent mining, freeing you up to do more important tasks. This modifier allows you to tweak various aspects of pickaxe and ore mining to make your mines more efficient.

Main features of the “Reduced Mining” mod (all parameters can be customized at your discretion):

Pickaxe Speed ​​Increase/Decrease: This modifier allows you to adjust the speed at which you mine blocks with your pickaxe. By default, the speed is increased by 20%, which means blocks are mined faster, allowing you to save time.
Ore Drop Chance Increase: This option allows you to adjust the chance that ore will drop double when mined. By default, there is a 20% chance of dropping double ore, which increases your production and improves your work efficiency.
Triple Ore Drop Chance: This option further increases the chance of ore drops when mined. By default, it increases the chance by 10% to the already double amount of ore. This allows you to mine more ore and greatly increases your efficiency.

name: Fargo's Souls DLC
description:
"Fargo's Souls DLC" for tModLoader is a unique extension for the original Fargo's Souls Mod, designed to integrate with the difficulty of "Eternity Mode" and adapted to work synchronously with other popular mods. Development and support is carried out by the official developers of Fargo's Mods.

Mod Compatibility:
The Calamity mod is currently officially supported.
New Difficulty Levels:
New difficulty modes have been introduced: "Eternity-Revengeance" and "Eternity-Death", which combine elements of Calamity's "Eternity" and "Revengeance/Death" modes, switchable in the Calamity difficulty interface.
Advanced Artificial Intelligence:
Expansion and improvement of the AI ​​of bosses from the original game and the Calamity mod for new difficulty levels.
New Accessories:
Added Fargo-themed accessories that integrate items, mechanics, and the Rogue class from the Calamity mod.
Balance and Progression:
Extensive changes in balance and progression for optimal compatibility of the content of both mods, customizable via the configuration file.
Error correction:
Fixed numerous bugs and problems that usually arise when using both mods and difficulty levels at the same time.
Planned Updates:

Development of compatibility with the Thorium mod.
Adding new enchantments, compounds and souls based on elements from the Calamity and Thorium mods.
Creation of new champions for added compounds.
Note: The current version does not support secret game seeds such as Zenith.

This expansion is designed for players looking for new challenges and unique gameplay mechanics that enhance the modded Terraria experience, offering an even deeper and richer gaming experience.

name: Wing Slot
description:
The "Wing Slot" mod for tModLoader adds a new slot for wings in your character's inventory in the game Terraria. This mod allows you to use wings along with other accessories without taking up a regular accessory slot.

Here are some of the main features of the Wing Slot mod:

Additional slot for wings: After installing the mod, an additional slot will appear in your inventory, designed specifically for wings. Now you can carry wings in a separate slot without taking up space for other accessories.
Conflicts between wings and accessories: The Wing Slot mod allows you to use wings with other accessories without conflicts. You can now carry both types of items at the same time and get the benefits of both.
Convenience and flexibility: This mod significantly improves the usability of wings in the game. Now you don't have to choose between wings and other accessories, you can use both types of items at the same time. This gives you more flexibility in creating your character and tailoring it to your gaming strategy.

name: No More Tombs
description:
The No More Tombs mod for tModLoader is a modification that changes the mechanics of tombs in the game Terraria. Instead of the player coming across tombs in the world and opening them for treasure, this mod removes tombs from the game and changes how rewards are obtained.

Tomb Removal: The mod removes all tombs from the world, preventing them from spawning.
New ways to earn rewards: Instead of finding tombs, players will receive rewards and treasures through other sources in the world of Terraria. For example, they can receive them as loot from powerful monsters, after completing quests, or through special events.
More Varied Gameplay: The removal of tombs allows for greater freedom in exploring the world of Terraria and allows players to enjoy more varied ways to develop their character.

name: DPSExtreme
description:
"DPSExtreme" for tModLoader is a unique mod that adds an exciting element of competition to multiplayer games. Have you ever wondered who deals the most damage to a boss? You can now track your DPS and DPS against bosses in real time, and compare it with your friends' DPS.

Features of the DPSExtreme mod:

Team DPS Meter: During boss battles, you will be able to see accurate statistics of your DPS and damage compared to other players on your team. This will help you understand who contributes the most to defeating the boss.
Boss Damage Counter: The mod tracks the amount of damage each player deals to the boss. You will be able to easily see which of you is making the most contribution to defeating the boss.
Competition and Fun: You can compete with your friends to see who can deal the most damage to bosses. Try to challenge bosses using the same weapons and see who can deal more damage. This will add an extra level of fun and tension to your battles.
Dominance Meters: The mod also provides cute and colorful meters that show how dominant your character is over bosses. Spectacular visualization of your power adds a visual element to your battles and makes you feel like a true hero.
DPSExtreme is a great mod for those who want to add an element of competition and fun to team battle games. Challenge your friends to see who is the strongest warrior and dominate the bosses with this exciting mod.

name: Too Many Accessories
ItemMagnetPlus
description:
This mod, called "ItemMagnetPlus", adds a new item called "Item Magnet", which does the obvious job of attracting items around you so you don't have to run around and collect them yourself.

The mod includes the following:

Item Magnet (and corresponding buff) which
can be crafted from simple materials (Iron/Lead)
works while in your inventory
can be turned on and off
has an adjustable range and speed of attraction of objects
improves after killing bosses
customizable via game configuration to suit your play style
How to use:

Using Item Magnet involves the following steps:

Left click toggles the range of action.
Right click shows the current range (you can always check the stats in the buff tooltip).
This right-click feature changes to "off" when the "Buff" option in the configuration is false.
Item Magnet stats improve after killing bosses.
If you want it to always be on or off, change the "Scale" option in the configuration to anything other than "Increase With Bosses".
Multiplayer:

This mod is compatible with multiplayer:

The mod's configuration is completely server-side, but the buff flag is always set to 1.
Items placed between two players with magnets will "float".
If the "Instant" option is enabled and multiple players are within the radius of the item, it will always be attracted to the same player (this depends on the order of attachment).
Due to the "catch delay" being set only in single player, items dropped by the player are instantly pulled towards them, which is normal behavior.
When using the Auto Trash mod, items may not be attracted and turn into “ghost” items.
Lost items due to this error cannot be restored.
Report bugs in the appropriate forum thread (please).
Progression: (default configuration)

Initial values:

Range = 10 blocks (each direction)
Speed ​​= 8
Acceleration = 8
Final values: (after killing Moonlord)

Range = 120 (one and a half screens)
Speed ​​= 32
Acceleration = 32

name: Vyklade's DBT Transformation Lib
description:
"Vyklade's DBT Transformation Lib" is a modification designed for the game Dragon Ball Terraria. It offers a set of methods, libraries and classes that will help in adding Super Saiyan transformations to the game.

This library provides a variety of features and tools to help players bring to life the iconic Super Saiyan transformations from the world of Dragon Ball. It allows you to add new abilities and abilities associated with these transformations, including improved strength, speed and energy attacks.

"Vyklade's DBT Transformation Lib" may be useful for players looking to expand and improve their gaming experience in Dragon Ball Terraria. It provides additional functionality and the ability to become a true Super Saiyan, increasing the level of interaction and excitement during the game.

name: Expanded Inventory
description:
The Expanded Inventory mod for tModLoader expands your gameplay experience by adding new features and expanding the capabilities of your inventory. With this mod you will be able to enjoy a larger inventory and get additional slots to store items from other mods.

Features:

Switching pages: The mod offers a convenient way to navigate through the expanded inventory. You can easily switch between different inventory pages using arrows or hotkeys. This feature allows you to efficiently organize and quickly access your items.
Inventory size increase: Goodbye standard inventory limitations! The Expanded Inventory mod allows you to significantly increase the size of your inventory. With extra slots, you will have enough space to store all your valuable items, resources and equipment.
Compatibility with other mods: This mod integrates seamlessly with other mods to ensure compatibility and smooth gameplay. You can use the expanded inventory slots to store items from different mods, allowing you to explore and use more content.
Settings to suit your taste: The Expanded Inventory mod offers you settings to optimize inventory management. You can customize your preferred hotkeys and personalize the mod to suit your gaming style.

name: Special Seeds
description:
Special Seeds is a mod created for the popular game tModLoader that adds a variety of unique seeds that can be used to create custom worlds. Inspired by mods such as "Not the Bees!" and "The Constant", this mod adds a new level of excitement and creativity to your gaming experience.

New Seed Options: The Special Seeds mod provides a collection of exciting seed options to choose from when creating a world. These seeds offer different types of terrain, structures, and challenges to explore.
Customizability: With the Special Seeds mod you can customize your own unique seed. While customization options are currently limited, you can mix different seeds together to create even more varied and interesting worlds.
Advanced World Gen Dependency: Please note that this mod requires the Advanced World Gen mod to be installed for full functionality.
Easy Seed Selection: To select a specific seed when creating a world, simply click on the gear icon next to the SEED option.
New Gaming Experience: Each seed offers a unique gaming experience with its own set of features and surprises. From icy landscapes to jungles, you will face various challenges and secrets along the way.
Available seeds:

Custom: Click on the tree button during world creation to select blocks.
Icemania: Spawn in a world where most of the surface and rock layers are covered in ice and snow. Giant ice spikes can be found everywhere, and there may also be hidden secrets waiting to be discovered!
Junglemania: Prepare to emerge into a world where dirt and stone are prevalent everywhere. Hives are scattered throughout the world, promising encounters with bees and their treasures!
Desertmania: Experience a sandy adventure by appearing in a world where most of the surface and rock layer is made up of sandstone and hardened sand. Prepare for a quagmire!
Meteormania: In this seed, the surface is mostly rock and the rock layer is filled with meteorites. Meteorites have fallen all over the surface, and you'll encounter meteorite pyramids that may hold valuable secrets!
Rainy Day: Prepare for a world where the entire sky is filled with clouds! Your spawn point will be high in the sky, providing a unique starting point for your adventures.
Cavemania: Explore a world filled with giant caves and underground wonders. Keep an eye out for the large earthen spikes underground, and at the very heart of the world you will find a huge pyramid of granite and marble hiding its secrets.
Nuked: Enter a world where most of the surface and rock layer is covered with earth. There is no normal grass or trees here and you have to be careful as the geiger counter starts ticking above the surface and in the liquids. Prolonged exposure to these areas will cause serious damage!
Trapmania: Beware of traps placed throughout the world! Pay attention to the cracked stone, as it will break if you step on it. Be careful to avoid unexpected surprises!
Woodlands: Start your journey in a world where a large tree dominates the spawn area. The world is filled with green leaves and branches, creating a unique and magical atmosphere.
Upside Down? (Upside Down World?): Travel to an upside down world where gravity is reversed. Get ready for a thrilling experience as you travel through this upside-down world!
Spider: Venture into a world full of spiders and their complex webs. Your spawn point will be underground, and beware as spiders are afraid of light!
Short: Experience a shorter world with a reduced size of several hundred blocks. Please be aware that combining this seed with others may increase the chance of errors.

name: Advanced World Generation
description:
This mod aims to add variety to the world generation process without violating the core principles of the original generator, aiming to remain as close to the vanilla version as possible.

Main features of the mod:

Compatible with vanilla and custom seeds: The mod allows you to combine different seeds with vanilla and custom options, so you can enjoy both "For the Worthy" and "Drunk" world generation, as well as other variations.
Possibility of choosing seeds: You can select different seed options using the gear icon located to the right of the seed input field in the world creation UI.
Disabling secret seeds: The mod removes the standard way to activate secret seeds, so no seeds will trigger a secret anymore, they can only be activated through the options UI.
Additional world generation improvements: In the mod settings you can enable the recommended additional improvement in world generation. It changes the generation process slightly, but at the same time significantly speeds it up, especially for large worlds, and fixes some problems.
Setting the world size: The mod also has the ability to customize the size of the world. It already works quite well, except for some graphical bugs associated with the vanilla version. Custom world size works best in combination with improved world generation and may be necessary in some cases. However, it's worth noting that if your world's width to height ratio is significantly different from vanilla, the generation may look unusual (at least for now).
Compatible with other mods: This mod is compatible with almost all other mods and I try to fix problems as soon as they are reported. However, there is a known compatibility issue with the Calamity mod, but it should be fixed by the developers of this mod. In any case, this mod by itself cannot cause a problem. If someone tells you to turn it off, that's stupid. If you want to fix a problem with another mod yourself, pay attention to the following possible reasons:
Some mods do not support the world size you choose, try to get closer to the vanilla size.
Some options you have enabled may not be supported in combination with other mods.
It is possible that the additional generation enhancement option conflicts with another mod, although this is unlikely.

name: Compare Item Stats
description:
Compare Item Stats Plus is a unique client mod developed for the game that gives you the ability to compare stats between the currently selected item and the item you hover over in the tooltip.

Mod features
Side by side comparison: The mod allows you to visually see the differences between the current item and the item the cursor is hovering over. This will help you make easier decisions when choosing equipment and optimize your gaming strategy.
Wide range of supported features: Compare stats such as damage, crit chance, speed, knockback, fishing/bait strength, lava fishing, lava critter fishing, pickaxe/axe/hammer strength, mana/life regeneration, mana usage, auto attack, range tool, class, flight time with wings, horizontal/vertical speed with wings, protection and life recovery.
Integration with equipment: If you hover over armor or wings and the selected item is of a different archetype, the mod will automatically compare those items to your currently equipped gear.
Intuitive interface: The mod has a simple and intuitive interface that is easy to use even for beginners.

name: Atmospheric Torches
description:
Atmospheric Torches is a mod for tModLoader that adds a unique look to your torches in Terraria.

Main features of the mod:
Improved visualization - This mod adds an orange tint to regular torches and tikki torches, giving them a bright and atmospheric look. Placed blocks and biome torches also receive a subtly flickering effect, adding to the overall ambiance of your world.
Brightness setting — In the mod settings you can adjust the brightness of the torches to your liking. Whether it's a soft glow or bright lighting, you have the ability to customize the lighting to create the perfect ambiance.
Immersive atmosphere - By adding a subtle shimmering effect to placed blocks and biome torches, Atmospheric Torches enhance the immersion in the world of Terraria. Explore dark caves or travel through different biomes while enjoying the atmospheric effects of flickering torches.
Compatibility and Stability — The mod is designed to be compatible with other mods for Terraria. However, it is worth noting that there is an extremely unlikely possibility of conflicts with other mods if they change the same specific line of code responsible for the color lighting of the torches. However, the likelihood of such conflicts is extremely low.
Easy setup — Installing and configuring the mod is not difficult. Simply download and install Atmospheric Torches using tModLoader and you can customize the flickering effect and brightness of the torches according to your preferences.

name: Shoe Slot
description:
"Shoe Slot" is a modification for tModLoader that adds an additional shoe slot in the game Terraria.

Main features of the mod:
Additional shoe slot - With this mod you get an additional slot in which you can place special shoe items. You will now be able to wear extra boots, sandals or other footwear items to help you on your adventure.
Unique bonuses for shoes - Each shoe you place in a new slot will provide unique bonuses and abilities to your character. For example, some shoes can increase your movement speed, provide extra jumps, or even allow you to float on water.
Character Expansion - Adding an additional shoe slot will allow you to expand the capabilities of your character. You will be able to create a unique combination of footwear items to get maximum benefits in different situations. Whether it's exploring dungeons, fighting bosses, or overcoming obstacles, the Shoe Slot mod will help you reach new heights.
Integration with other mods - This mod is compatible with other mods for Terraria, allowing the additional shoe slot to be used in conjunction with other improvements and content provided by other mods.

name: Lan's Unlimited Buff Slots
description:
Lan's Unlimited Buff Slots is a modification for tModLoader that expands the number of buff slots available in Terraria.

Main features of the mod:
Unlimited buff slots - With this mod you are no longer limited in the number of buffs you can activate at the same time. Enjoy freedom and variety by activating all the buffs that will help you on your adventure.
Convenient buff management — The Lans Unlimited Buff Slots mod provides a convenient interface for managing active buffs. You can easily add, remove or switch buffs without restrictions.
Mod support - This mod is compatible with other Terraria mods, allowing you to enjoy not only the expanded number of buff slots, but also other improvements and content provided by other mods.
Improving efficiency - With the ability to activate more buffs at once, you can increase your effectiveness in battles and adventures in the world of Terraria. Your character will become more powerful and prepared for any challenges you face.

name: WorldGen Previewer
description:
WorldGen Previewer is a mod for tModLoader that modifies the world generation screen by adding a preview of the map while it is being generated. Now you can see how your world is shaping up and make decisions based on that information. This mod also gives you the ability to pause, resume, retry, skip or cancel generation at your discretion.

Mod features:
Generation Preview - This mod allows you to see a preview of the map during world generation. Youll be able to watch your world gradually take shape, which will help you make meaningful decisions about the process moving forward.
Generation management - WorldGen Previewer gives you complete control over the world generation process. You can pause the generation to take a closer look at the current result, and then resume or repeat the generation if you need to make changes. You can also skip certain generation steps if you are not interested in them, or cancel a generation if you are not happy with the current progress.
Repeating the generation step - With this mod you can repeat a specific generation step to create multiple instances of certain world elements. For example, you can repeat the dungeon creation step to generate several dungeons and choose the one that interests you the most.
Experience Improvement - Thanks to WorldGen Previewer, you can enjoy an improved world generation experience. Youll be able to make more informed decisions based on previews and control the generation process to create the perfect world in Terraria.

name: Friendly NPCs Don't Die
description:
Friendly NPCs Don't Die is a modification for the game Terraria that allows you to protect your friendly NPCs from enemies and deadly dangers. Instead of worrying about the safety of their lives, this mod allows you to enjoy their presence and interaction without worrying about their death.

Immunity to mortal dangers - With this mod, your friendly NPCs will become invulnerable to deadly dangers such as falling, lava or poison. No more worrying about them accidentally dying while exploring or fighting.
Protection from enemies - The mod also provides protection to your friendly NPCs from enemies who may attack them. They will have increased stamina and the ability to repel attacks, allowing them to survive even in the most dangerous situations.
Setting the protection level - The mod allows you to customize the protection level for each friendly NPC according to your preferences. You can choose how resistant they are to hazards and attacks to strike a balance between protection and realism.
Compatible with other mods - Friendly NPCs Dont Die is compatible with other mods, allowing you to enjoy protecting your friendly NPCs even while playing with other mods. Create unique combinations and enjoy the safety of your team.

name: Fargo's Best of Both Worlds
description:
The Fargo's Best of Both Worlds mod introduces you to the ability to create unique and exciting worlds in Terraria. Taking you beyond normal world generation, this mod allows you to select various features that are usually only available through secret seeds.

Mod features:
Spawn Both Evils — Create a unique world in which both types of evil will be present: Corruption and Death. Challenge two powerful bosses and show your skills in the battle against darkness!
Spawn Both Ore Sets - Gain access to both sets of ores: Copper/Tin and Iron/Lead. Expand your capabilities to create powerful equipment and weapons!
Invert World — Immerse yourself in a unique underground world, inverting its atmosphere and creating amazing landscapes. Explore new opportunities and open new horizons!
Guaranteed Ocean Caves - Let yourself be immersed in the underwater world without having to worry about finding ocean caves. They are guaranteed to be present in your world, offering you unique opportunities for exploration and adventure!
Increased Surface Living Trees - Add beauty to your world by increasing the number of living trees on the surface. Enjoy greener, more picturesque surroundings that inspire you to new adventures!
Large Bee Hives — Create large bee hives to get even more honey and other useful resources. Improve your production and enjoy the fruits of your labor!
Guaranteed Pyramid in Desert — Guaranteed entrance to the underground desert through the pyramid. Discover new secrets and treasures hidden in the sand caves!
Start in Ocean — Start your adventure right in the ocean. New challenges, resources and amazing sea creatures await you!
Huge Jungle Temple — Meet a huge temple in the jungle, full of dangers and treasures. Show your courage and collect the rewards hidden in the depths of this mysterious place!
Additional Spider Caves - Discover additional spider caves full of dangers and valuable resources. Explore them, fight spiders and conquer new territories!

name: Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]
description:
"Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]" is an innovative mod for Terraria that adds unique shine and item customization mechanics to the gameplay. With this mod you can give your items new effects and add shine, creating exciting visual combinations and enhancing your gaming session.

Features of the mod “Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]":
Customizable glitter effects: Mod “Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]" allows you to add shine to items in Terraria. You can choose from a wide range of textures, colors and animations to create unique sparkly effects for each item. This allows you to completely customize the appearance of items and give them your own personal touch.
Intuitive effects editor: Mod “Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]" provides you with a simple and intuitive effects editor with which you can customize the shine for each item. You can adjust brightness, transparency, animation speed and other parameters to achieve the desired visual effect.
Advanced effects combination options: Mod “Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]" offers advanced effects combination capabilities. You can apply multiple glitter effects to one item, creating unique combinations and adding multiple layers of glitter. This allows you to create impressive visual effects and highlight your characters style.
Compatibility with other mods: Mod “Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]" is fully compatible with other mods for Terraria. You can add glitter to items from other mods and combine their effects, expanding your options and creating unique style combinations.
Easy to install and use: Mod “Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]" is easy to install and intuitive to use. You can quickly get used to its features and start adding shine to your items in Terraria.
"Can I Shimmer This? [CIST]" is a mod for the game Terraria that allows you to add shine and customize items in the game. With it, you can create unique glitter effects, combine them and give your gaming session new visual possibilities.

name: Display Luck Count
description:
The Display Luck Count mod gives players the ability to display the exact luck count in the game Terraria. Luck is an important game stat that affects various aspects of gameplay, including item drops, chances of critical hits, and other random events.

Main features of the mod:

Displays the exact luck value in the game interface.
Providing information about the players luck level in real time.
Help in assessing and analyzing the influence of luck on various game mechanics and events.
How to use the mod:

Install the "Display Luck Count" mod for tModLoader.
After installing the mod, a new element will appear in the game interface that displays the player’s current luck value.
When your luck level changes, the value will be updated automatically to reflect the current situation.
The Display Luck Count mod provides players with useful information about the meaning of luck, helping them better understand and control their chances of various game events.

name: World Link
description:
Have you often forgotten what world and what character you usually play in, after creating many characters and worlds? The World Link mod offers a solution to this problem by allowing you to link worlds to specific characters.

How to use this mod

Select the character you want the world to relate to.
After this, a button with a chain icon will appear in the world selection menu.
Click on this button to bind the selected world to the character.
Now, in the character selection menu, you can immediately launch a connected world.
Decoupling the world from the character

If you need to untether the world from your character, follow these steps:

In the character selection menu, find the selected character in the list of worlds.
Click on the binding button (this time the icon will be in the form of a cross).
The world will be untied from the character.
Setting up the display of the button in the config

You can also hide the display of the button if the character does not have a world attached to it by making the appropriate changes in the mods configuration file.

I hope this information will help you use the World Link mod more effectively and avoid forgetting when choosing your character and world.

name: Concise Mods List of mods
description:
The Concise Mods List mod is a tool for managing and viewing installed mods in the game Terraria. It displays a compact list of mods with information about the name, author and version of each mod. The mod also provides quick access to the settings and functions of each mod, as well as the ability to enable or disable them directly from the list.

Main features of the mod:

Compact display of the list of installed mods in the game Terraria.
An informative presentation of each mod, including name, author and version.
Quick access to the settings of each mod.
Ability to enable and disable mods directly from the list.
The "Concise Mods List" mod makes it easier to manage and view installed mods in the Terraria game, providing a convenient interface and quick access to the settings of each mod. This allows players to easily customize their gaming experience and enjoy the variety of modifications available in the Terraria community.

name: Shop Expander
description:
"Shop Expander" is a mod for tModLoader that expands the functionality of stores in the game. It is designed to provide the player with more trading options, expand the range of goods and add new features to make the gaming experience even more diverse.

The main features of the Shop Expander mod include:

Expanded range of products: The mod allows you to add new products to the game stores. This may include new weapons, armor, accessories, tools, building materials, and more. Expanding the range of goods allows players to have more options for improving their character, building and fighting enemies.
New trading features: Shop Expander also adds new features to stores to make shopping more fun and convenient. For example, a mod might include the ability to sell items that were previously unsellable, or add special offers and discounts on items. This allows players to benefit more from trading operations and the economic aspect of the game.
Setup and Compatibility: The Shop Expander mod usually offers customization and compatibility with other mods. Players can choose which items will be added to stores, as well as customize prices and availability of items. Additionally, the mod can be compatible with other mods to provide even more trading and economic development opportunities in the game.

name: HP Awareness
description:
"HP Awareness" is a mod for tModLoader that provides the player with additional information about health indicators in the game. It is intended to increase the player's awareness of their current health and provide useful indicators for decision making in battle.

Key features of the HP Awareness mod include:

Additional health information: The mod adds additional health indicators to the player screen. This may include information about current health, maximum health, health level, and other metrics that will help the player better understand their physical endurance in the game.
Convenient access to information: HP Awareness provides health information in a player-friendly format. It can be integrated into the games user interface, allowing the player to easily track their health in real time without the need to constantly open the inventory or character window.
Personalization and customization: The HP Awareness mod usually includes the ability to customize and personalize health information. The player can choose which health indicators to show and how they will be displayed on the screen. This allows each player to customize the mod to suit their preferences and gaming style.

name: Gravitation Don't Flip the Screen
description:
"Gravity Don't Flip the Screen" is a mod for tModLoader that prevents the screen from flipping when using the Gravity item in the game. This mod significantly improves gaming comfort and prevents possible problems with screen orientation when using this item.

Key features of the Gravity Dont Flip the Screen mod include:

Stable screen orientation: When using the Gravity item, which normally changes the screen orientation, the modification prevents this effect. This allows the player to maintain a stable screen orientation while using the item, which greatly improves the gaming experience.
Gaming comfort: Thanks to the "Gravity Dont Flip the Screen" mod, players no longer experience the discomfort of flipping the screen when using the Gravity item. This allows them to enjoy the game more freely and comfortably without being distracted by screen orientation issues.
Maximizing productivity: Since the modification prevents the screen from flipping when using the Gravity item, this may also improve game performance. By eliminating the need to redraw the screen, computer resources can be used more efficiently, which can result in a smoother gaming experience.
The Gravitation Dont Flip the Screen mod greatly improves the gaming experience by preventing the screen from flipping when using the Gravity item. If you want to avoid screen orientation issues and enjoy a more comfortable gaming experience, this mod will be a great addition for you.

name: Summoner UI
description:
Summoner UI is a mod for tModLoader that extends the functionality of the Summoner class in Terraria. This mod provides a user-friendly user interface (UI) that helps Summoner players better manage their creatures and use them effectively in battle.

Improved user interface: The mod adds a new user interface specifically designed for the Summoner class. This interface allows players to easily view information about their creatures, their health, damage and other stats.
Creature Control: Summoner UI provides intuitive tools for controlling summoner creatures. You will be able to set priorities for attacks, control the positioning of creatures, and also customize their behavior in battles.
Bonus tracking: The mod also provides the ability to track bonuses associated with the Summoner class. You will be able to see active bonuses and their duration, which will help you effectively use your creatures in battles.
Interface customization: Summoner UI allows you to customize the interface according to your preferences. You can change the size and position of interface windows to better suit your gaming style.

name: Platform Helper
description:
Platform Helper is a useful mod for tModLoader that makes creating platforms and building in Terraria much easier. This mod provides players with additional tools and features to make the building process more efficient and convenient.

Improved platform placement features: Platform Helper offers improved platform placement features, making platform placement more accurate and faster. You can easily create horizontal and vertical platforms, and automatically connect them together to create more complex structures.
Automatic platform expansion: The mod also offers the ability to automatically expand platforms during construction. You can easily create long platforms by moving your mouse in the desired direction, and the mod will automatically place new platform blocks.
Improved stair function: Platform Helper adds an improved stairs feature that makes it quick and easy to create stairs in the game. The mod automatically adds staircase blocks when you specify the direction and length of the staircase.
Additional tools and features: The mod also offers additional tools and features that simplify and improve the construction process. You can use the automatic block filling feature, create duplicate structures, and much more.

name: Item Checklist
description:
Item Checklist is a mod for tModLoader that provides players with convenient tools for tracking and controlling items in Terraria. With this mod you can easily manage your collection of items, mark those you have already collected and keep track of those that you still need to find.

Full control over items: Item Checklist allows you to keep track of all items in Terraria and control their availability. You will be able to see which items you already have and which ones still need to be collected or found.
List personalization: The mod allows you to customize the list of items at your discretion. You can choose which items to show and which to hide so you can focus on the ones that matter to you.
Marks and filters: Item Checklist offers the ability to check off items that you have already collected or received. You will be able to see the progress of collecting each item and monitor your achievements. In addition, the mod provides filters to help you sort and find the items you need.
Tips and information: The Item Checklist mod provides useful hints and information about each item. You will be able to find out its characteristics, abilities and crafting recipes to better understand how to use them in the game.
List of mod functions Item Checklist:

View and control all items in the game: You will be able to see a complete list of items and track their availability.
Hints and information about each item: You will be able to find out details about each item, including its characteristics, abilities and crafting recipes.
Check-ins to track progress: You will be able to mark items that you have already collected or received to monitor your progress.
Setting up a list of items: Youll be able to customize your list by choosing which items to show and which to hide.
Filters for convenience: The mod provides filters to help you sort and find the items you need.

name: Angler Shop
description:
Angler Shop is a mod for tModLoader that adds new mechanics and a store for the Angler character in Terraria. This mod allows players to receive unique items and rewards in exchange for completing fishing competition tasks.

New Angler Shop: The Angler Shop is a unique store that is available to players after completing a certain number of tasks in the fishing competition. In the store you can exchange your rewards for various items and accessories.
Unique items and accessories: Angler Shop offers a wide selection of unique items and accessories that cannot be obtained any other way. These items can provide players with additional bonuses and abilities that enhance their gaming experience and capabilities.
Levels and progress: The Angler Shop mod introduces a leveling and progression system for the "Angler" character. Complete fishing competition tasks to level up your character and unlock new items in the store.
New tasks and challenges: Angler Shop mod offers new fishing tasks and challenges that can be completed to earn points and progress. Take part in various fishing competitions and prove your skills!
Unique rewards: For successfully completing tasks and gaining a certain number of points, you can receive unique rewards that are only available in the Angler Shop. These rewards can be both visual and functional, providing players with unique features and benefits.
List of items and accessories in Angler Shop:

Fishing rods: Unique fishing rods with improved characteristics and abilities.
Tackle and bait: A variety of tackle and bait that will help you catch rare species of fish and get additional bonuses.
Fishermans accessories: Unique accessories that improve your fishing skills and offer additional bonuses.
Decorative items: Visual items that can be used to decorate your base or world in Terraria.
Unique tools: New tools and items to help you in fishing and other adventures.

name: Fishing Reborn
description:
Fishing Reborn is a mod for the tModLoader game that completely reworks and expands the fishing mechanics. It adds new fish species, gear, events, and fishing locations to make fishing in Terraria even more fun and varied.

New Fish Species: Fishing Reborn introduces more than 50 new fish species that can be caught in various bodies of water. Each fish has its own characteristics, rarity and abilities.
Expanded Gear: The mod adds new fishing gear, including fishing rods, bait and accessories. These items improve your chances of catching fish and offer unique bonuses and abilities.
Fishing Events: Fishing Reborn introduces new fishing events that randomly occur and offer additional challenges and rewards. Take part in competitions with other fishermen and prove your skills!
New fishing spots: The mod adds new biomes and bodies of water in which you can fish. Explore different regions and discover new types of fish and gear.
Fishing Achievements: Track your fishing progress with the new achievement system. Achieve various goals and unlock unique rewards.
List of new gear and items:

Multi-colored fishing rods: Fishing rods of different colors with unique abilities and bonuses.
Magnetic baits: Baits that attract fish from afar and increase the chances of catching fish.
Fishing accessories: Accessories that improve your fishing skills and offer additional bonuses.
Fishermans tools: New tools like nets and nets to help you catch rare fish and other aquatic creatures.

name: Magic Builder
description:
Magic Builder is a mod for tModLoader in the game Terraria, which brings new opportunities for the construction of housing and auxiliary structures. If you're tired of seeing the same old wooden boxes every time you play through the game, then Magic Builder is a great choice. This mod makes home building fun and easy by offering homes and structures in a variety of biome themes that can be created using magical consumables.

Main features of the mod:

New Homes and Structures: Magic Builder adds a variety of new homes and structures created in a variety of biome themes. Now you can create unique and beautiful houses that meet the requirements of different biomes, such as forest, desert, mushroom kingdom, etc. Each home has its own characteristics that make it unique and functional.
Examples of some houses:

Dryads House: A dwelling covered in foliage and decorated with flowers, ideal for the forest biome. In it you can find magical items related to vegetation.
Nomad Tent: A mobile desert dwelling that looks like a cozy oasis with a cheerful atmosphere. Contains useful items for survival in the desert biome.
Magic consumables: To create houses and structures in the Magic Builder mod, special magical consumables are used. These materials can be obtained from various sources, such as new mobs, chests, or alchemical recipes. They allow you to create unique decorative and furniture pieces that add style and ambience to your buildings.
Examples of magic consumables:

Magic Fairy Feather: Can be obtained from unique mobs living in the forest biome. Used to create a birds nest that replaces a regular table.
Arcane Sandstone: Mined in the desert and used to create special walls and furniture in Nomads tent.
New NPC - Householder: With the advent of the Magic Builder mod, a new NPC - Householder - appears in the world of Terraria. He is a fan of houses and can communicate with them. The Householder will move into your world after you craft your first item from the mod. You can talk to him to learn more about his unique building methods or to see what kind of homes he has to offer.

name: Helpful NPCs
description:
Helpful NPCs is a gameplay-expanding mod that adds five new non-player characters (NPCs) to the game. Each of them offers unique items that are usually difficult or boring to obtain.

Miner: Specializes in the sale of bars, gems and natural blocks. To interact with him, you will need a Sparkling Stone, created from one stone block and a certain amount of gold coins.
Hunter: Offers items related to monsters, souls and essences, as well as ammunition. To access his assortment, you need a Shining Gel, made from one gel and several gold coins.
Fisherman: Specializes in selling various baits, regular and quest fish. To communicate with him, you must have a Shining Fish, created from one perch and several gold coins.
Ecologist: Offers a variety of herbs, seeds and animals. To gain access to his product, you will need a Dazzling Flower created from Dayflower and a number of gold coins.
Chester: An unusual NPC who offers random items that can usually only be found in chests. He may appear randomly in the game world.

name: New Beginnings
description:
New Beginnings is a mod for Terraria that is designed to change and improve many aspects of the game, including more thorough progression, improved combat mechanics, and new gameplay elements. This mod is only available through Tmodloader, an extension that adds support and makes it easier to install mods for Terraria.

Features of New Beginnings mod:

New Classes: The mod adds three new classes - Shaman, Polytech and Alchemist - each with their own unique abilities and skills. Players will be able to further customize their characters and use them to better defend against enemies and attack more effectively.
Improved Combat Mechanics: The mod adds a wider and more varied arsenal of weapons, as well as new combat mechanics such as blocking attacks and extended ranged attacks. Players will be able to use different tactics and strategies to win battles.
More thorough development: The mod adds new world events consisting of deeper and more interesting stories, and also provides the opportunity to develop in different ways. Players will be able to choose their path through the game and shape their story, as well as discover the mysteries and secrets hidden throughout the world of Terraria.
New Items: The mod adds many new items including weapons, armor, and accessories. Some are unique only to certain classes and playstyles, allowing for greater flexibility in character and ability development.
Lists of the main features of the New Beginnings mod:

New classes:
Shaman
Polytech
Alchemist
Improved combat mechanics:
New weapons and expanded ranged attacks
Attack blocking
More thorough development:
New world events and stories
The ability to choose your path in the game
New items:
Unique weapons, armor and accessories for each class
Lots of new items to provide more flexibility in character and ability development.

name: Antisocial
description:
"Antisocial" is a mod for TModLoader that adds various features and changes to the game aimed at improving multiplayer and overall gaming experience.

1. Protection from Griefers:

Privacy System: Allows players to protect their buildings and property from unwanted intrusions by setting access rights to blocks and chests.
Damage Protection: Enables the ability to mute damage from other players to prevent accidental attacks.
2. Multiplayer improvements:

Interface for managing game sessions: Allows you to quickly create and manage servers and multiplayer sessions.
Personal settings: Allows you to customize many multiplayer parameters, such as movement speed, difficulty level and others.
Administrative Tools: Gives server administrators additional tools to control the gaming environment and players.
3. Interface and amenities:

Information display: Adds the ability to display various information on the screen, such as coordinates, time of day and others.
Player Search: Allows you to quickly find other players in a multiplayer game.
Chat Interface: Improves the chat interface, including custom colors and fonts.
4. Corrections and optimization:

Bug Fixes: The mod includes fixes for various bugs and issues related to multiplayer and the game interface.
Performance Optimization: Helps improve game performance when using multiple mods and players.
5. Advanced commands:

Adds various commands for server administrators that allow you to manage players, blocks and events in the game.

name: Autofish
description:
AutoFish provides players with the ability to catch fish easily and quickly, freeing them from the routine and monotony of this task in the Terraria game. The mod offers many features and settings to make your fishing experience more satisfying and efficient.

Automatic cutting: The AutoFish mod automatically hooks the fishing rod when a fish bites, which reduces the players reaction time and increases the chances of a successful catch.
Delay time setting: You can adjust the delay time between the trigger and the mods response. This allows you to catch different types of fish that require different times to bite.
Automatic garbage disposal: AutoFish can automatically discard unwanted items such as broken pieces and old shoes so you can focus only on your valuable catches.
Angler Interface: The mod includes a convenient game window showing information about the current fishing status and catches.
Setting up fishing lures: You can choose which fishing lures to use and adjust your fishing settings to get the catch you want.
Inventory support: AutoFish takes into account your inventory and automatically stops fishing when your inventory is full.
Multi-rod support: The mod allows you to use multiple fishing rods at the same time, which increases your fishing productivity.
List of catches: AutoFish keeps a list of your catches so you can keep track of what types of fish youve already caught.

name: OmniSwing
description:
OmniSwing is a mod for the game Terraria developed for TModLoader. It brings variety and uniqueness to the world of Terraria, giving players new options for combat and exploration.

Unique fighting styles: OmniSwing provides different fighting styles that you can choose depending on your preference. This allows you to personalize your combat experience.
New fighting techniques: The mod adds new combat techniques and skills that can be used with different types of weapons. This enriches your arsenal and gives you more options for creativity in combat.
Integration with TModLoader: OmniSwing is easy to install and interfaces with TModLoader, making it compatible with other Terraria mods. This allows you to enjoy the variety of content provided by the modding community.
Multiple Weapon Support: The mod is compatible with various types of weapons, including swords, darts, arrows, daggers and more. You can choose weapons depending on the situation and fighting style.
Updates and support: OmniSwing developers regularly release updates, fixing bugs and adding new content. This ensures a stable and up-to-date version of the mod.

name: absoluteAquarian Utilities (SerousCommonLib)
description:
SerousCommonLib is a universal library designed to provide support for various mods created by AbsoluteAquarian.

This modifier includes an extensive set of functions that makes the gameplay even more fun. Some of the key features include:

IL/On editing assistants: Simplified editing and interaction with IL and On.
Type extensions: Expand the possibilities of the game by adding new types.
Types of UI Elements: Create unique interface elements for your mod.
Easy modification of tooltips: Customize tooltips for a more informative gaming experience.
Tile scanning information: Improved tile scanning information for easier development.
ILoot Helpers: Simplified handling of loot and rewards.
This is just a small overview of the functionality of SerousCommonLib, which can be very useful for Terraria mod developers.

name: ParticleLibrary
description:
ParticleLibrary is a mod for TModLoader that gives mod developers the ability to create and use various particles and effects in their modifications. This mod significantly expands the possibilities of creating visual effects in the game Terraria.

Create a variety of particles: The mod allows you to create various types of particles, such as sparks, smoke, fire, explosions, light, water effects and much more. You can customize particle parameters such as speed, size, color, duration and so on.
Using Motion Effects: ParticleLibrary provides a variety of particle motion effects, including swirls, rotation, path movement, and other animation effects. This allows you to create impressive visual effects and animations.
Interactive Particles: You can create interactive particles that react to player actions or other events in the game. For example, you can create particles that disappear when a player approaches, or particles that react to contact with certain objects.
